title: cannot find a string in x64dbg even when using search all strings
content: I am trying to debug a program for testing but for some reason i can NOT find any strings related to registeration like Registered, Unregistered,Blocked in x64dbg,  i can see all these strings in the interface of the program but not in the X64dbg, although i have already tried search ALL strings, what am i missing?

answers_data.content: It is possible that the application is packed using a packer or the strings are encrypted. I would first see if it is packed using a tool like PEiD or Detect It Easy.
